name: Student Application Design Programme
description: Educational technology initiative enabling students to design game applications for classroom use. Part of the broader Silicon Playgrounds digital education framework.

digitalDividend.description: Application revenues contribute to educational funding

outcome.description: Following departmental pilot programmes, the Educational App Design Initiative was launched nationwide, enabling students to develop educational software.
outcome.impact: Over 10,000 student-designed applications deployed across UK schools
outcome.notes: This department's pioneering work in educational technology directly shaped national curriculum digital skills requirements
